title: Amherst Connect
description: Database and interface for events at Amherst. One-stop shop for looking at the big pictures of all events at Amherst!

title: Matching Engine
description: This is the matching engine we are building to match students with each other & ideas!

title: Amherst Coursework
description: Amherst Coursework is a web application that provides Amherst College students and faculty with an intuitive, advanced interface for course search.

title: Resumax
description: Resumax is an AI chatbot designed to help students enhance their resumes effectively.

title: MatPlus
description: A Python package for effortlessly creating stunning plots.

title: Amherst Lost and Found
description: Each year, campuses gather tons of lost items—many go to landfills. Our Django-based Amherst Lost & Found app uses AI and maps to reunite items with owners, cutting waste and helping the planet.
